html:
4.13.24  1:27 pm   recommend me one of your (musical) videos to watch. also recommend one for self-esteem boost ( except just did a bad thing ).

      if i could choose one then i wouldn't have to make so many

4.13.24  12:33 pm   How many syllables is the word 'orange'? I guess it depends on if you pronounce it like "ornj" or "or-inj", but I feel like I kind of pronounce it as a hybrid between those two, so like 1.5 syllables maybe? 

      i think of it as 2, but that's not the only way

4.13.24  11:02 am   Why is it easy to work on school work or job work, but hard to work on personal projects?

      maybe because when you do something yourself you have to play all job positions. and no one is telling you when to do which one

4.13.24  10:31 am   hey mr bill i love love love your work! which tetromino in tetris speaks to you?

      whichever one fits

4.13.24  9:28 am   can you tell when questions are written by non natives in English?

      sometimes yes, en soms niet

4.13.24  8:06 am   what should i do first if i wanna learn how to play the guitar (guitar acquired)

      that's between you and the guitar. ask the guitar

4.13.24  8:02 am   Do you enjoy consuming fiction

      i consumed it all

4.13.24  6:42 am   What question did I ask again?

      this one

4.13.24  4:47 am   How much sawdust can be put in food before the eater notices?

      1 piece

4.13.24  1:14 am   how many times can you say orange in a sentence. asking for a friend

      1 or 2

4.12.24  10:21 pm   Have you ever been scuba diving? 

      no

4.12.24  9:01 pm   after just learning how to play a lot of songs i listen to i feel like i understand basic chord theory, and its magical. like i just learned the basic melody of a new one and i can explain in my mind why they used all the chords that they did. this is incredible. its like learning the secret to a magic trick.

      it's really a lot like learning languages (like the english you've been typing in). you magically know what to say somehow

4.12.24  6:49 pm   any effective studying tips

      the first tip i have is to know what you're studying. perhaps you already know, but you didn't say. just "studying _____" without filling in that blank will leave you in a very confused state with nothing to do

4.12.24  6:44 pm   writing song. like what I have so far. I think it's building up to a chorus. it isn't clear to me how the chorus should sound. should I keep listening to what I have so far until I come up with a chorus or should I walk away and come back fresh

      if you step away and come back you will be more likely to get it

4.12.24  6:33 pm   Do you think soap comes from the natural process of evolution or that it's a gift from god? (Or maybe a gift from the soap gods)

      it comes from the natural process of technical revolution

4.12.24  6:17 pm   did you keep a teddy bear in bed with you as a child?

      no

4.12.24  5:40 pm   is there a trick to not take something more seriously the more you care about it?

      eventually you'll get burned out from caring so much and then you'll relax

4.12.24  2:37 pm   what is a riff?

      usually it means some kind of melody with no words to it. usually played by an instrument. the word 'riff' also seems to suggest 'catchy' perhaps

4.12.24  1:33 pm   You posted my favorite song on my birthday, HOW DID YOU KNOW?!

      i didn't know that, but i do now, assuming you aren't telling a fib

4.12.24  12:21 pm   what is your current longest video idea?

      about 12 and a half minutes

4.12.24  11:13 am   I've seen all the complaints of you not using capital letters, but why don't you use capital cities more often? Stockholm

      i use capital letters, as well as refrences to capital cities, perhaps more often than the average person

4.12.24  9:50 am   how do I deal with wanting to kill myself each time I play a wrong note. not literally but you know what I mean

      playing wrong notes is more fun than you realize. take charge, and see if you can play even wronger notes

4.12.24  9:33 am   Why not run for president this year?

      there is a minimum age limit of 10 trillion years old, where as i am only 9 trillion

4.12.24  8:58 am   what sound did you use for the riff in might quit?

      that is what's known as a synthesizer

4.12.24  8:22 am   why is helvetica neue the only font

      maybe you forgot about the other ones

4.12.24  8:11 am   Can I tell you a secret 

      sure

4.12.24  4:41 am   Do you ever procrastinate procrastinating?

      no but i will

4.12.24  3:21 am   why is time so scary?

      because 'now' and..... 'now' are not the same

4.12.24  3:16 am   Do you delete the default cube or let it live?

      neither. there is no default cube in my workflow

4.12.24  12:38 am   how come some songs are two songs?  i.e. Band On The Run or Layla

      sometimes the songwriter just likes to do that. other times, it can be the result of a collaboration

4.11.24  9:50 pm   is it me or does middle Db to Db below sound like a very unstable 8th?

      it is just you, or the tuning of your instrument

4.11.24  9:07 pm   What's the best scene in lego batman?

      for me it's the microwave scene, but i suspect you already knew this about me

4.11.24  6:51 pm   why are songs typically 2-4 minutes long but movies are typically 90-120 minutes long?

      this will make it all the more ground-breaking for you to come along and do ANYTHING different

4.11.24  5:29 pm   Hi Mr Bill been thinking of givin up. Should I?

      the reason i don't know the answer is because you didn't tell me what you're talking about

4.11.24  5:09 pm   Were sandwiches invented by sand witches?

      no

4.11.24  3:34 pm   What do you think of a 6/5 time signature? 

      it would sound the same as 6/4, except it would break the writing system for no reason. so then you'll have to make your own writing system. but it will sound the same as 6/4

4.11.24  3:28 pm   When you say something is common sense I feel like it isn't, maybe I just have uncommon sense 

      if you had uncommon sense then you'd find such uncommon common-sense indeed common

4.11.24  3:06 pm   is this the krusty krab?

      nothing is the krusty krab

4.11.24  2:09 pm   Is sonic the hedgehog sexy?

      no, but he will be, if you go back into the studio and change it

4.11.24  1:26 pm   how do i get this stupid bad song out of my head 

      listen to another bad song for a while

4.11.24  12:07 pm   why do you think we decided on three dots for a long pause?...

     because it's the shortest amount to correctly convey the feeling

     follow up question, do you think you can use it after punctuation?

     sure, go ahead. if you use it after a period, you'll probably need some separating space in between

4.11.24  11:13 am   What's the reason behind everything?

      behind everything, of course, is every reason

4.11.24  10:52 am   what do you think of the renaissance

      reminds me of the first naissance

4.11.24  9:30 am   Would you say your music is more regular or normal?

      it's a hybrid

4.11.24  9:29 am   I want to put in even more effort than I already do. How can I strive to work even harder at putting in more effort?

      figure out why you want to. then you'll be able to do it

4.11.24  8:09 am   did mount saint helen blow up yet

      it did earlier

4.11.24  7:40 am   Is it true that ?

      yes

4.11.24  7:11 am   will your next song feature a penny whistle

      i don't think so

4.11.24  12:41 am   hey bill do you fuck with microtonal shenanigans in music

      if i do, i don't explicitly announce it as such. so in that case, what's the point, right

4.11.24  12:33 am   who are you going to vote for 

      i can't decide. there's too many choices available
